resources.string: " Kids Picture Book and Spelling Learner is an Educational picture book. For Kids to learn spellings as well as pronouncing words. \n\n Kids Picture Book and Spelling Learner is also a fun way of learning new things, it is a complete kids learning book, it contains so many colorful pictures which will help the kids to understand the spellings as well as pronouncing words. In this picture book, kids will help to pronounce each word very easily. Kids can easily catch up each and every word. Each letter contains sound. It can easily Understand the spelling of the word. This Kids Picture Book and Spelling Learner contains more than 300+ of different colorful pictures and words."
